plot: Specialist military unit Bravo 45 having retrieved A.1.1.4.H; a biological weapon that could infect the world with a plague of Biblical proportions, are on the run to their rendezvous point...
title: A.1.1.4.H
plot_es: Specialist military unit Bravo 45 having retrieved A.1.1.4.H; a biological weapon that could infect the world with a plague of Biblical proportions, are on the run to their rendezvous point...
